body_html:
Since having a separate restful service will not be a requirement for most users, I would say, let's close the issue and PR for now. If you want to deserialize the base64 string in the graph, you can still write a custom serving_input_receiver_fn that does just that, but we will hold off on making it a general utility given that this is a specialized need.

Thanks, @tobegit3hub !

body:
Since having a separate restful service will not be a requirement for most users, I would say, let's close the issue and PR for now. If you want to deserialize the base64 string in the graph, you can still write a custom serving_input_receiver_fn that does just that, but we will hold off on making it a general utility given that this is a specialized need.

Thanks, @tobegit3hub !
